title: Crocodilian Identification
description: Snap up your knowledge of crocodiles, alligators, caimans, and gharials

questions.question: What is the main visible difference between an alligator and a crocodile when their mouth is closed?
options: Crocodiles have a V-shaped snout and visible lower teeth
